If you did not get a VPN confirmation dialog, you might have \"Always on VPN\" enabled for another app. In that case only that app is allowed to connect to a VPN. Check under Settings-> Networks more .. -> VPNs>

We don\'t monitor, filter or log any network activity.
We need this permission for the application to function. You can also get in touch with customer support if you need assistance.
AEAD ciphers like AES-GCM use an integrated authentication mechanism
Always permits traffic between devices on your local network
Notice that some system applications (such as the Google app) could bypass the VPN when access to the local network is allowed.

After the app is updated, the app will autoconnect to keep you protected.
Using a non PIA DNS could expose your DNS traffic to third parties and compromise your privacy.
In order to enable MACE, the default DNS must be used. Would you like to reset your DNS to default?
MACE will be disabled while using a custom DNS.
For security reasons we require your PIA password to perform a change in your account. Please input your PIA password to proceed.

Please enable WiFi in order to select trusted networks.

Trusted wifi requires location permissions to detect nearby wifi networks. If that permission is revoked, this feature will no longer work.\n\nTo use this feature, go to Settings>Apps>PIA VPN, and ensure the location permission is toggled on.
We’re confirming your gift card code\nwith our system. It could take a\nmoment so hang in there.

Browse anonymously and hide your IP
Protect yourself on up to 10 devices at a time
Disconnects the VPN and automatically reconnects when the timer elapses.
The PIA \"Block connections without VPN\" feature requires turning ON the Always-ON VPN in the Android Settings.
To proceed, go to Settings - Network & Internet - Advanced - VPN - tap on the Settings icon - activate Always-on VPN.

We have detected that you have the Killswitch enabled. We have changed how this feature works by integrating the Android \"Block connections without VPN\" setting for both WireGuard and OpenVPN. Please review the changes in Settings to ensure you remain protected.
Connect on system start. We recommend to turn on this setting if you are using VPN Always On.
We are updating our OpenVPN implementation, for more information, click here
We hope our VPN product is meeting your expectations
How about a review in Google Play?
We appreciate you sharing your experience
Do you want to give feedback? We can help you to improve your experience using PIA
Payment will only be charged to your account at the end of your trial.
We need your email to send your username and password.
Would you like to return to the home screen? You can resume the subscription process at any time by clicking Login->Login using purchase receipt.
Please check your e-mail for a login link.
It\'s a new, more efficient VPN protocol that offers better performance, lower CPU usage and longer battery life.
Configure how PIA behaves on connection to WiFi or cellular networks. This excludes disconnecting manually. \n\nThis feature is experimental.
Choose a WiFi network to add new rule.
Setup rules to handle auto-connect rules for trusted and untrusted networks. \n\nThis feature is experimental.
Allow PIA VPN to access your location. This will permit us to detect nearby Wi-Fi networks.
You\'ll see a prompt asking for Location permission. To proceed, tap on \"While using the app\"
We don\'t monitor, filter or log any network activity.
Great! You\'re almost done! The PIA Network Management feature also requires access to the background location services.
To proceed, go to Settings > Apps > PIA > Permissions - enable Background access to the location services.
Activate your Dedicated IP by pasting your token in the form below. If you\'ve recently purchased a dedicated IP, you can generate the token by going to the PIA website.

Secure your remote connections to any asset with a dedicated IP from a country of your choice. During your subscription, this IP will be yours and yours alone, protecting your data transfers with the strongest encryption out there.
Your dedicated IP will expire soon.
Your token is expired. Please generate a new one from your Account page in the website.
Your token is invalid. Please make sure you have entered the token correctly.
Your Dedicated IP has been activated successfully. It will be available in your Region selection list.

Due to a technical problem, purchases through Google Play are currently disabled. We are working to resolve the situation.\n\nIf you already have an account with a subscription, you can login by pressing the Login button.

Due to a technical problem, purchases through Amazon are currently disabled. We are working to resolve the situation.\n\nIf you already have an account with a subscription, you can login by pressing the Login button.
The PIA \"VPN Kill Switch\" feature requires turning ON the Always-ON VPN in the Android Settings
To proceed, go to Settings - Network & Internet - Advanced - VPN - tap on the Settings icon - activate Always-on VPN.
Unable to navigate to network settings
Want to help make PIA better? Let us know how we can improve!
Please help us improve our service
To help us ensure our service\'s connection performance, you can anonymously share your connection stats with us. These reports do not include any personally identifiable information.
Help us improve by sharing VPN connection statistics. These reports never contain personally identifiable information.

This minimal information assists us in identifying and fixing potential connection issues. Note that sharing this information requires consent and manual activation as it is turned off by default. We will collect information about the following events:

 • Connection Attempt
 • Connection Canceled
 • Connection Established
 • Time to Connect

 For all of these events, we will collect the following information:

 • Platform
 • App version
 • App type (pre-release or not)
 • Protocol used
 • Connection source (manual or using automation)

 All events will contain a unique ID, which is randomly generated. This ID is not associated with your user account. This unique ID is re-generated daily for privacy purposes.

 You will always be in control. You can see what data we’ve collected from Settings, and you can turn it off at any time.
In order to use Private Internet Access, you’ll need to renew your subscription.
Access to local network will be allowed. Some apps (such as the Google app) might leak and report your real IP.
Access to local networks will be blocked
Access to local network will be allowed. Some apps (such as the Google app) might leak and report your real IP.
Access to local networks will be blocked

To ensure you\'re never connected without your VPN, we suggest enabling Block Connection Without VPN in your Android settings. This can be enabled after turning on Always-on VPN for PIA. This will ensure Android does its best job to have your PIA VPN running at all times when connected and block connections without a VPN - aka a VPN killswitch. The Killswitch setting in the PIA VPN app has been deprecated in favor of setting \"Block Connection without VPN\" at the system level in your Android settings since Android 8.0+ has this feature built in now. If there\'s ever a problem, you\'ll be notified and Android will block all internet connections that aren\'t going through your VPN.
